A data transfer object that encapsulates pagination parameters for API requests, providing cursor-based pagination with configurable limits.

## Key Components

- **cursor** - String field for cursor-based pagination navigation
- **limit** - Integer field for specifying page size with validation
- **getLimit()** - Custom getter that enforces default value (20) and bounds validation (1-100)

## Usage Example

```java
// Create pagination criteria with builder pattern
PaginationCriteria criteria = PaginationCriteria.builder()
    .cursor("eyJpZCI6MTIzNDU2fQ==")
    .limit(50)
    .build();

// Use in API controller
@GetMapping("/items")
public ResponseEntity<List<Item>> getItems(PaginationCriteria pagination) {
    String cursor = pagination.getCursor();
    int limit = pagination.getLimit(); // Returns 20 if null, enforces 1-100 range
    
    return ResponseEntity.ok(itemService.findItems(cursor, limit));
}

// Default behavior
PaginationCriteria defaultCriteria = new PaginationCriteria();
int defaultLimit = defaultCriteria.getLimit(); // Returns 20
```
